projects.name: react-currency-converter
projects.label: React Currency Converter
projects.description: A single page application written with React in functional programming like approach. It uses the exchanged rates API.

projects.name: portfolio
projects.label: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: The project for this website. It's written with React and TypeScript in functional programming like approach. For the styles the mobile-first approach is used.

projects.name: halloween-gallery
projects.label: Halloween gallery
projects.description: Fully responsive single page website with gallery example. It's made with plain JavaScript in functional programming like approach. The styles with the mobile-first approach.

projects.name: 3d-print-toolbox-modified
projects.label: Modified 3D Print Toolbox
projects.description: Blender 3d addon with utilities for 3d printing. It's based on existed built-in addon, the '3D Print Toolbox'. This expanded version has more fexibility and influence on the mesh clean up settings.

projects.name: login-register-system
projects.label: Login and Register System
projects.description: Login and Register System written in OOP PHP and MySQLi. It was made as a school project.

projects.name: mini-dice-game
projects.label: Mini Dice Game
projects.description: A simple dice game written in OOP PHP and MySQLi. It was made as a school project.
